title: Statusi Project
description: Contributed to the development of Statusi, a software based on Ongage, designed for data visualization, ETL processes, and graphical representation of data. Developed the Reports Page, implemented robust authentication tools, enabled interactive data visualization, and assisted in ETL processes.

title: Ongage Search Tool
description: Enhanced the Ongage search tool with advanced search capabilities. Redeveloped the user interface using React.js, improved the user experience, and implemented significant UI enhancements for a more intuitive interface.

title: Salary Automation Tool
description: Developed an automated salary system using Google Apps Script, integrated with Google Workspace. Designed and implemented a fully automated payroll system for salary calculations, disbursements, and record-keeping.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Created a personalized movie recommendation system using machine learning in Python. Utilized advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze user preferences and provide tailored film suggestions.

title: Harvestify | Farming Web
description: Developed an ML-powered farming application designed to provide crop advice and optimize yield. Implemented machine learning algorithms for accurate crop advice, designed a user-friendly interface, and integrated advanced data analytics and visualization tools for enhanced decision support.

title: Expense Tracker
description: Developed an expense tracker application to help users manage and monitor their financial transactions. Designed and implemented a full-stack solution with an intuitive interface, budget tracking, and seamless interaction between frontend and backend components.

title: WhatsApp Clone
description: Developed a WhatsApp clone application using the MERN stack, replicating core functionalities of the popular messaging platform. Implemented real-time messaging with WebSockets, robust authentication mechanisms, and an intuitive user interface for a seamless chat experience.
